title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated Parmesan.
Drain pasta and combine with pancetta off heat.
Add egg-cheese mixture quickly and stir.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.
